bio: 9 years of crafting elegant solutions to complex problems.

skills.title: Frontend Mastery
skills.description: React • Vue • Angular • TypeScript • Modern CSS

experiences.description: Leading service registry implementation, Spring Cloud Config integration, and codebase modularization. Developed 40+ REST APIs with 90% test coverage. Reduced batch processing time by 99% using Java 21 virtual threads.
Led Digital Gold Backend team, implemented new features increasing user engagement by 30%. Redesigned Coupon engine improving redemption rates by 40%. Reduced API latency by 80%.
Engineered microservices for Kafka data processing, implemented event-driven updates, and managed system stability under 90,000 requests per second.
Developed knowledge repository and clustering model for improved information retrieval. Created regression model showing 60% increase in lead conversions.
Implemented microservices architecture for ML components, led experiments with new algorithms, and developed interactive training dashboards.

education.description: Specialized in DSA, LLD, HLD, Java Backend, and more. Top 10% performer with 500+ problems solved.
